name: Cambio de Servicio
query:
select
s.party as cliente,
s.nombre_del_cliente as nombre,
cu.company_name as Compania,
ad.departamento,
cu.customer_group as Tipo_Cliente,
spd.name as plan_id,
spd.estado_plan as estado,
spd.plan,
(  select i.stock_uom from `tabItem` as i where i.name=sp.item  )as Velocidad,
spd.cost as precio,
sp.item_group as portafolio,
spd.service_start,
s.subscription_update,
(  select spd2.name from `tabSubscription Plan Detail` as spd2 where spd2.name=spd.old_plan   ) as planID_anterior,
(  select spd2.plan from `tabSubscription Plan Detail` as spd2 where spd2.name=spd.old_plan  ) as plan_anterior,
(select spd2.cost from `tabSubscription Plan Detail` as spd2 where spd2.name=spd.old_plan ) as Precio_Anterior,
s.campana,
s.tipo_contrato,
s.vendedor,
s.name as contrato,
s.no_contrato as no_contrato,
day(spd.service_start) as dia,
month(spd.service_start) as mes,
year(spd.service_start) as año
from `tabSubscription Plan Detail` spd
inner join   `tabSubscription` s on spd.parent = s.name
inner join  `tabSubscription Plan` sp on sp.name = spd.plan
inner join `tabAddress` ad on ad.name = spd.direccion
inner join `tabCustomer` cu on  cu.name = s.party
where spd.old_plan is not null  and  spd.service_start >='2023-05-06'
and DATE(spd.service_start) >= %(FechaD)s 
and DATE(spd.service_start) <= %(FechaH)s
and spd.estado_plan<>'Inactivo'
